content.prompt: If a function f is continuous for all x and if f has a relative maximum at (-1, 4) and a relative minimum at (3, -2) , which of the following statements must be true?

choices.label: The graph of f has a point of inflection somewhere between x = -1 and x = 3.
The graph of f has a horizontal asymptote.
The graph of f has a horizontal tangent line at x = 3.
The graph of f intersects both axes.

topic.text: 1.16: Working with the Intermediate Value Theorem (IVT)

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Provide reasons or rationales for solutions and conclusions.
